trends: There have been no other sightings in L'Alfàs del Pi
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details my wife and i were sitting on our balcony in albir, spain on sunday may 20, 2012 just after 9 pm. the skies were clear and there was no wind. i watched a bright object coming from the mountains on what i would guess 2-3 miles altitude. sometimes it was moving from left to right, slowly and most of the time it was almost still\not moving. after a couple of minutes it started to move east (towards us) and after a minute or two it took off almost straight up and it looked like it accelerated to enormous speed instantly and it went smaller and smaller and disappeared in about 3 seconds. we can not tell the size of this as we do not know the altitude. the colour as we saw it was almost glowing (red \orange) and the light was consistent. it took off at a small angle so we had some kind of speed impression as opposed to just leaving us in a straight line. i have never believed in this before and i do not know if i do now but this is the most inexplicable thing i have ever seen.
